message: I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a valuable product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000.
I appreciate the offer, but $18,000 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $16,500. This is the lowest I'm willing to go for now.
I appreciate you coming down, but $16,500 is still a bit too high for me. How about $15,000? I'm really interested in this product and I believe this is a fair price for both of us.
